issue.title: [C++] Add option to is_nan kernel to return true on null
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13366](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13366). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the `is_nan` C++ kernel returns `null` on `null` values. Consider adding a boolean option to this kernel to control whether to consider `null` as `NaN`. This would allow the code added in ARROW-12850 to be much simplified.
